segments.text: Here ' s my passport . I'm a visiting scholar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , these are all my personal effects .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's in the bag ? Would you mind opening the bag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . I don't know what's dutiable.Do I have to pay duty on things for my own use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No.You don't have to pay duty on personal belongings .
segments.speaker: S2
